import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { deleteProduct } from "../../redux/actions/actionsProduct" import EditProduct from "./EditProduct" import { Button } from 'reactstrap' import "../../App.css"; const ProductCard=({data})=>{ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const deletee=()=>{ dispatch(deleteProduct(data._id)) } return(
{data.design}

{data.desc}

Prix {data.prix}
) } export default ProductCard
